item.title: Research
item.description: a.author{ color: grey; } a.primary{ font-weight: bold; } Refereed Publications Josef Spjut, Ben Boudaoud, Jonghyun Kim, Trey Greer, Rachel Albert, Michael Stengel, Kaan Aksit, David Luebke; Toward Standardized Classification of Foveated Displays, IEEE Transactions on Visualization and Computer Graphics, March 22, 2020.
